WorkingWin Health Support

Supporting Your Mental Health
and Wellbeing Journey

Access free, confidential support to help manage your mental health and wellbeing. Our specialist team is here to support your journey to better health and employment.

Contact Support Team
5,000+
People Supported
97%
Success Rate
12m
Duration of Support
Key Features

How We Support You

Personalised Support

One-to-one guidance from a dedicated Employment Specialist who will help identify your goals and develop a realistic action plan.

In-Work Support

Ongoing assistance to help manage health conditions at work, ensuring you can thrive in your current role.

Health & Wellbeing Coaching

Qualified coaches provide strategies to help you cope with health conditions in both work and daily life.

Tailored Support
Personalised guidance for your unique needs
Eligibility Criteria

Who Can Access Support?

Check if you're eligible for our programme and take the first step towards better employment support.

Basic Requirements

  • Be aged 16 or over
  • Reside in Sheffield, Rotherham, Doncaster, or Barnsley
  • Have a physical or mental health condition (self-diagnosis accepted)
  • Have entitlement to public funds

Programme Duration

  • For unemployed: Up to 12 months support, including 4 months in-work support
  • For employed/sick leave: Up to 4 months support to manage health conditions
  • Must not be enrolled in another DWP employment programme
